title: Warm lentil salad
ingredients: ['200g brown lentils', '1 medium carrot, diced', '2 teaspoons fresh thyme leaves', 'Salt', 'Freshly ground pepper', 'For the dressing', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '3 teaspoons olive oil', '2 teaspoons Dijon mustard', '2 spring onions, finely sliced', '6 ripe tomatoes, chopped']
